owner_summaries.key_concerns: High number of reconciliation exceptions and duplicate detections

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicating potential misstatements
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Enhance flux analysis procedures and increase frequency of reviews

residual_risks.description: Significant reconciliation exceptions in AP and AR processes
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement automated reconciliation tools and conduct regular training sessions
